net.vivialconnect.model.account

Class Transaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.vivialconnect.model.account.Transaction

  • public class Transaction
extends Object
    Purchasing a number, sending a SMS or MMS, etc. are registered as transaction. This allows to get detailed insights about how an account credits or cash are being spent.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Transaction() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getAccountId()
      Customer account ID
      Balance getBalances()
      Total cash or credits spent in the account.
      BigDecimal getCashAmount()
      Amount spent equivalent to ten thousand cents.
      BigDecimal getCreditAmount()
      Credits spent for this transaction.
      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode getData()
      JsonNode object with detailed data about the transaction.
      int getId()
      Transaction ID
      Date getPostTime()
      Date when the transaction was issued.
      String getTransactionType()
      Transaction Type, e.g.: SMS Out, SMS IN, etc.
      int getUnitCount()
      Number of times of this transaction.

      • getData

        public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode getData()
        JsonNode object with detailed data about the transaction. This differ for each transaction type. See JsonNode documentation for more: https://fasterxml.github.io/jackson-databind/javadoc/2.8/com/fasterxml/jackson/databind/JsonNode.html
        Returns:
        JsonNode object
